conversation.speaker: Kabir
conversation.text: Arre welcome back folks! [laughs] So, Ananya, India most populous country! Kaisa lag raha hai?

conversation.speaker: Ananya
conversation.text: Oh bhai, sahi bola! Matlab 1.4 billion log! Sab jagah log hi log. [laughs]

conversation.speaker: Kabir
conversation.text: Sahi mein, aur bata, economy bhi toh kitni grow kar rahi hai na?

conversation.speaker: Ananya
conversation.text: Haan, IT sector se toh kafi log naye phone le ke ghoom rahe hain. Fascinating, right?

conversation.speaker: Kabir
conversation.text: Bilkul! But poverty bhi hai... Matlab thoda bittersweet hai. [sighs]

conversation.speaker: Ananya
conversation.text: Pehle se better hai, lekin inequality hai yaar. Kab badlega pata nahi. [sighs]
